title: PMS Relief Krill Oil Supplement - Advanced Omega-3 Formula with EPA, DHA, Phospholipids, and Astaxanthin for Women‚Äôs Heart Health, Brain Function, Anti-Aging, and Overall Well-Being
descriptionHtml:
Introducing our PMS Relief Krill Oil Supplement, a premium formula designed specifically for women to support hormonal balance and overall well-being. Each serving delivers essential Omega-3 fatty acids, including EPA and DHA, sourced from sustainably harvested krill oil. These powerful nutrients not only help alleviate PMS symptoms but also promote heart health, enhance brain function, and contribute to anti-aging effects.

Rich in phospholipids, our krill oil ensures optimal absorption and bioavailability, maximizing the health benefits you can experience. Additionally, the inclusion of astaxanthin, a potent antioxidant, further protects against oxidative stress and supports skin health.

Whether you’re looking to ease discomfort during your menstrual cycle or simply enhance your daily health routine, our PMS Relief Krill Oil Supplement provides comprehensive support. Experience the unique benefits of this advanced Omega-3 formula and embrace a healthier, more vibrant life.
shortDescriptionHtml: Discover PMS Relief Krill Oil, an advanced omega-3 supplement with EPA, DHA, phospholipids, and astaxanthin. Supports heart health, brain function, anti-aging, and overall well-being. Enjoy the benefits of this premium krill oil formula.
supplementFacts:
Supplement Facts
Serving Size: 2 Softgels
Servings Per Container: 30

Amount Per Serving / %DV
Calories 20
Total Fat 2 g 3%
Krill Oil 1,000 mg **
(Euphausia superba)
Phospholipids 400 mg **
Omega-3 Fatty Acids 300 mg **
(EPA 180 mg, DHA 90 mg)
Astaxanthin 0.5 mg **

** Daily Value (DV) not established

Percent Daily Values are based on a 2,000 calorie diet.

Other Ingredients: Gelatin, Glycerin, Purified Water.
